com.google.android.exoplayer2.video

Class VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.video.VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper

  • public final class VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Makes a best effort to adjust frame release timestamps for a smoother visual result.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper.DefaultDisplayListener 
      private static class  VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper.VSyncSampler
      Samples display vsync timestamps.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper()
      Constructs an instance that smooths frame release timestamps but does not align them with the default display's vsync signal.
      VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper(android.content.Context context)
      Constructs an instance that smooths frame release timestamps and aligns them with the default display's vsync signal.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper

        public VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper()
        Constructs an instance that smooths frame release timestamps but does not align them with the default display's vsync signal.

      • VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper

        public VideoFrameReleaseTimeHelper(@Nullable
                                   android.content.Context context)
        Constructs an instance that smooths frame release timestamps and aligns them with the default display's vsync signal.
        Parameters:
        context - A context from which information about the default display can be retrieved.

    • Method Detail

      • enable

        public void enable()
        Enables the helper. Must be called from the playback thread.

      • disable

        public void disable()
        Disables the helper. Must be called from the playback thread.

      • adjustReleaseTime

        public long adjustReleaseTime(long framePresentationTimeUs,
                              long unadjustedReleaseTimeNs)
        Adjusts a frame release timestamp. Must be called from the playback thread.
        Parameters:
        framePresentationTimeUs - The frame's presentation time, in microseconds.
        unadjustedReleaseTimeNs - The frame's unadjusted release time, in nanoseconds and in the same time base as System.nanoTime().
        Returns:
        The adjusted frame release timestamp, in nanoseconds and in the same time base as System.nanoTime().
